text: Cornelius White (10 March 1901 – 1975) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward. ==Career== Born in Leicester,Frost, p. 409 White spent his early career with Whitwick Imperial, Birmingham, Oldham Athletic, Llandudno and Bangor City. White signed for Bradford City from Bangor City in June 1928,Frost, p. 409 and scored 4 goals in 4 league appearances for the club,Frost, p. 389 before moving to Hereford United in June 1929. He later played for Loughborough Corinthians and Nuneaton Town. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Date of death missing Category:English footballers Category:Birmingham City F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Llandudno F.C. players Category:Bangor City F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Hereford United F.C. players Category:Loughborough Corinthians F.C. players Category:Nuneaton Borough F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football forwards
title: Cornelius White (footballer)
